content: Metaverse KombatMetaVerse Kombat is a captivating 3D fighting game that brings back memories of classic gaming, with a futuristic Metaverse twist and integration with Binance blockchain. The game offers players an exciting range of characters and dynamic arenas to choose from, and allows for both solo and multiplayer gameplay.MetaVerse Kombat's gameplay centers on close-range combat, featuring a familiar fighting game system that includes blocking, throwing, ground fighting, and blocking abilities.check Metaverse Kombat presale details on : https://icogems.com/ico/Metaverse-Kombat
